Language Processing and Python

This chapter addresses questions on combining programming techniques with large quantities of text. It covers automatic extraction of key words and phrases, tools and techniques provided by Python for natural language processing, and interesting challenges of NLP. The chapter is divided into sections that alternate between computing with language and closer look at Python.

Key Concepts:

  • Combining programming techniques with large quantities of text
  • Automatically extracting key words and phrases from a text
  • Tools and techniques for natural language processing in Python
  • Challenges of natural language processing
  • Examining shared contexts between words
  • Determining word location in a text using positional information
  • Visualizing word usage patterns over time with dispersion plots
  • Indexing Lists
  • Concatenating Sentences
  • Appending to a List
Language Processing Python Natural Language Processing intensifier common_contexts similar dispersion_plot lists concatenation
